title: PSA: Don't say GG at the end of a 4v5
body: GG stands for Good Game. A 4v5 is NOT a good game, its a really unfair and frustrating game. It can be really annoying when you have an afk from the 6th minute and at the end the enemies say GG, its almost like saying gg ez.

replies.body: Great. Now the community is even crying about "good game".
m8 im not crying about it, i certainly dont have the right to cry about toxicity as i used to be really toxic myself. just trying to say the meaning of ''good game''
So what's a good game then?
a normal game of league of legends
Meaning? I need specifics. Because if I win by a lot...don't want to hurt some po lil guy's fee fees by saying "GG"
basically any game with the same number of players on each team

sdsdfdf's logic: If a 4v5 game is virtually even in gold and lasts 45 mins, it's a horrible game and you're shit for saying "GG". 
But, if a 5v5 game's score is 45-3 and team ff@20, it's a good game.

GG is essentially a handshake after the match.

You say it to be polite.
well i guess i have a different view on gg than most of the community

What about those of us who consider gg a sign of sportsmanship? I say gg at the end of a 4v5 to compliment the enemy for suffering through it.

Granted, I usually say "gg sorry about 4v5" to make it clear I don't mean any bm
well gg is a sign of sportsmanship but in a 4v5 its annoying to hear
But what if the 4 team is winning?
then it is a good game, as it shows the superior skill and sportsmanship of the winning team :D

saying GG is equal to shaking hands after a football game/hockey game etc it isnt disrespectful in theory... but considering context surrounding the GG could be... but for the most part its the polite thing to do... just like when you are at work and its morning.. and every asshole you pass says morning or good morning like you dont fukin know its morning for god sakes its 545 am i know its morning .... fuk i hate mornings and people 


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
When being a sportsmanlike person is being toxic now, lmao the world is over.
its not toxic at all, just a really dumb thing to say

So you said you don't want people to say "gg" after a 4v5 because you feel it wasn't a good game, but 99% of the time "gg" is a term used to acknowledge the other team in a respectful manner, but now you're upset if they do because to you it wasn't a good game.

If anything you should be happy they don't drop some hard BM on you.

1. gg=good game, not a term for acknowledging the other team in a respectful manner
2. BM doesn't upset me at all, in fact im the type of guy who spams mastery, spams ? and says gg ez at the end of every other game

1. To most people who aren't Toxic bmers, gg is a form of positive acknowledgment  in respectful manne
2. If beat you in a 4v5 and say gg. that would be bm that upsets based off what you said in this thread.
annoys me, not upsets
If being honest is toxic, then why not?
Can't tell if you're against what I said or for what I said...

Against, I'd say.

Since saying "bg ez" after a very one-sided match can get you restricted, then saying "gg" after a game with an AFK should be punishable too.

So basically after a match I shake your hand as a sign of respect I should get punished for it? LOL


{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

you can always mute or ignore opposing side chat. or what you like them to say? regardless your not going to receive it well if your from the losing side.
"sorry for the loss"
"Better luck next time:
"You played well m8"
"Thanks for the win"
"Bye"
"Game over"
honestly just ignore or block out all chat, its place for trolling, flaming and whining.

Its custom to say gg after every game at this point. It pretty much means "the game ended".

If you don't like that someone said gg, just don't worry about it. They probably didn't mean to offend you.
agreed
